author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is a 80x version of 81x PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16441 

- Introduce era pA_2016 option in Calo configuration
- change parameters in HI calo configuration file, as discussed in https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/issues/432.
title: pr80x pA era in L1T emulator
